input_args.text: 'Next Prev Swipe left/right A mechanic wrote the customer’s bizarrely creative description of the problem word for word When someone brought their car in for repair because of a rattling noise, the mechanic felt compelled to record their exact words and T9C-gars shared a photo on Reddit. \n“Check rattle noise like 2 skeletons making out on a tin roof during a hailstorm using a tin can for a condom.” \nLet’s hope they checked under the bone-it.'
